scripts.dev: start npm run dev-client-windows &&  npm run start-redis && cross-env ENV='development' nodemon index.js
scripts.build-client-windows: npm run clean & parcel build client/scr/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.build-client: npm run clean && parcel build client/scr/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-client: npm run clean && parcel client/scr/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-client-windows: npm run clean && parcel client/scr/index.html --out-dir client/dist
